channel.title: Hack griefer
channel.description:
I am not the only one that is having this happen to them. if you read this and this has happen to you please post here.
Ok. I have my chests locked. When i logged into day my house and falador was perfectly fine the only problem is someone had removed my chests and placed dirt in the spots where they had been. when i walked out side someone had placed lava on one corner of my hut. last night i had a chest removed also, but i was able to retrieve some stuff last night; this chest was also locked, and i was only off for a couple of minutes(maybe 5).
I am sorry to announce I will not continue to play the server until this person is caught and this problem is dealt with. I had too much stuff get deleted b/c of this.
I have not looked at the code for the lwc plugin, so idk if the problem is a hack client, hole in the lwc plugin, or if one of the staff members(shouldnt be but u nvr know) that have the power to delete chests is doing this. I may look on youtube or google for exploits in lwc, and deleting protected chests to see if other server have had this same problem and what not.
the only people i have seen by falador is nueb, dick, and maybe one more person idk. idk if either one of them had anything to do with this all im saying is that i have seen both of them there b4. and dick had dug a hole in the floor of my hut. cole may have seen the person responsible b4; when cole boxed me in at my house when i was afk, he said the reason he did that was he saw a guy in leather boot and a bucket of lava near me so he thought boxing me in would help.
lastly, the one responsible seems to only destroy chest, and leaves lava somewhere near.
edit: pics of the damage. IK the situation is for the time being dealt with but here they are anyways.
lava: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17873459/Screenshot%20-%2001122011%20-%2011%3A35%3A13%20AMgrief.png[/img]
chests replaced by dirt: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17873459/Screenshot%20-%2001122011%20-%2011%3A35%3A47%20AMgrief2.png[/img]

item.title: Hack griefer
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:27, topic:378054”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=473939.msg3466279#msg3466279 date=1294931282]

Here’s Varrock’s bank.

City banks should be removed anyway Pointless not letting players look after their own resources in the city.

They are there so the owner can tax the players.
Also, it makes it feel more of a city if you have a bank
[/quote]
Should be a different way of taxing[/quote]
Propose a different way? This is easier for the city owner, because otherwise he’d have to go around each citizen’s house and collect taxes from their chests.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

sorry if there was any confusion when i said map reset. what i meant was map restore. b/c i know the restores are there. i was also wondering since the map is stored in chunks doesnt that mean you dont have to restore the entire map; you only need to restore those chunks? but the problem would be knowing where the chunks are located.
